correction_response:
This tweet is misleading. While it is true that Eric Welch, an off-duty Pentagon officer, was arrested for drug distribution, there is no evidence to suggest that he was dealing Fentanyl to children during Trick or Treating. The arrest was made on Oct. 28, not on Halloween, and the narcotics involved were reportedly cocaine, not Fentanyl. The arrest was the result of a narcotics investigation, not a Halloween event. Please refer to these articles for accurate information: 
https://www.wusa9.com/article/news/local/virginia/off-duty-pentagon-officer-arrested-drug-distribution-case/65-0ecc31f1-32f1-498a-92bf-c86461c2ac07
https://wjla.com/news/local/eric-welch-pentagon-force-protection-police-officer-arrested-alexandria-arlington-county-virginia-suspect-distributing-cocaine-narcotics-firearm-weapon-charges-search-warrant-guns-jail-criminal-investigation-washington-dc-crime
note_1_text: This tweet contains a manipulated image. The original headline is "Off-Duty Pentagon Cop Caught Dealing Cocaine, Police Say", from the tabloid The Daily Beast. There is no mention of fentanyl, Trick-or-treating, or children. https://www.thedailybeast.com/pentagon-police-officer-eric-welch-was-dealing-cocaine-in-arlington-say-police
note_2_text: This tweet contains a manipulated image. The police officer was dealing cocaine, not fentanyl: https://www.thedailybeast.com/pentagon-police-officer-eric-welch-was-dealing-cocaine-in-arlington-say-police

refute_evidences: - Officers from the Arlington County Police Department have arrested and charged 33-year-old Eric Welch, an off-duty Pentagon Force Protection Agency police officer, for his alleged connection to a drug distribution case. Reference: https://www.wusa9.com/article/news/local/virginia/off-duty-pentagon-officer-arrested-drug-distribution-case/65-0ecc31f1-32f1-498a-92bf-c86461c2ac07 published on 2022-10-31 18:53:00

- Welch was taken into custody on Oct. 28 in the 1300 block of South Scott Street after detectives saw him purchase narcotics for distribution, authorities said. A firearm was also recovered at the scene. - Detectives initiated a narcotics investigation after receiving information about a suspect possibly distributing cocaine in Arlington County. Officers identified Eric Welch, 33, of Alexandria as the suspect, according to a news release. tweet_image2text: An article claiming, "Off-Duty Pentagon Cop Caught Dealing Fentanyl to Children During Trick or Treating." It attached a picture of a man's face. It was written by Justin Rohrlich and published at 7:52PM ET on Oct 31, 2022.
